alert.note: Alert for Hill County; Northern Blaine County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 10 at 2:17PM MST until January 13 at 5:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THURSDAY... ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THURSDAY TO 5 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 25 below zero. For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 55 below zero. * WHERE...Hill County and Northern Blaine County. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 5 PM MST Thursday. For the Wind Chill Warning, from 5 PM Thursday to 5 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 5 minutes. Frostbite and hypothermia are possible if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
